question: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and other commercial banks spend Rs ___________ crore every year on currency management operations.
explanation: National Institution for Transforming India (NITI) Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant confirmed that the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and other commercial banks spend Rs 21,000 crore every year on currency management operations. The objective of the NITI Aayog is to increase the adoption and use of digital payments in India.
